title: Yosemite National Park: Best Intentions
body: Best Intentions                         Best Intentions Who would have thought that giant sequoia groves need to be burned in order to be saved? Learn how early park managers discovered the importance of fire the hard way, and see how today's managers carefully manage fire in Yosemite. (26:00)  Duration:26 minutes, 22 seconds           Â     Learn more about fire management in Yosemite.
